meanings.sent1: The ocean became overfished, leading to a decrease in fish population.
meanings.sent2: The overfished lake struggled to support the once abundant fish species.
meanings.sent3: The overfished river was like a buffet that had run out of food.
meanings.sent4: Her mind felt overfished, drained of all creative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The overfished field was barren, devoid of the usual wildlife sounds.

meanings.sent1: Fishermen were warned not to overfish the lake to protect the ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to stop overfishing the river to allow fish populations to recover.
meanings.sent3: The fishermen accidentally overfished the pond, leaving it empty of fish.
meanings.sent4: She felt like she was overfishing her brain, trying to remember too many things at once.
meanings.sent5: The team had to stop overfishing the area to prevent irreversible damage to the marine life.
